author: O4705LZdeborahs
title: Wonderful Birthday holiday for my husband and I !!
text:
We had a wonderful stay at the Mandarin Paris. The location of this hotel is excellent, close to all the best shopping places and nice, cool, trendy restaurants which we went to. The staff of the hotel were excellent in all ways, they really made our holiday special. Overall the hotel is modern and well appointed and have good facilities.
If anyone is looking for a luxury hotel and we have stayed in many luxury hotels in Paris, Mandarin Paris would be our first choice !
